experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Optimised Search and Recommendation in Product Retail Industry using Knowledge Graph• Engineered Labelled Property Graph (LPG) Database in Amazon Neptune, ingesting the modified Product Catalogue data in Amazon S3• Leveraged hierarchical relationships in the graph that reduced search space for product search using Gremlin Query Language for the graph traversal• Employed PageRank Algorithm using Gremlin to recommend similar products based on common nodes and attributes identification from the database• Built a real-time Efficient Apriori module to recommend the frequently bought together products from the graph using the customer transaction data• Dockerized, the ML Module using AWS EC2 Instance and developed dashboards and User Interface using Stremlit for visualization
